A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film particularly does not have a \"correct rating\". People say you either love it or hate it\, however for me it withholds both elements which balance it out for me to just say it is a good movie. When I first saw this movie I was a little disappointed however I left feeling shocked and a feeling I hadn't really felt after watching any other movie in theaters. This movie is unique\, has its really high highs but also pretty low lows. The biggest complaint I have is the subplot that takes up too much screen time and is a very painful segment of the movie. However\, looking at this movie as a whole\, I enjoyed it and am at peace with it.
